org.magicdgs.readtools.utils.read

Class ReadWriterFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.magicdgs.readtools.utils.read.ReadWriterFactory

  • public final class ReadWriterFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory for generate writers for all sources of reads with the same parameters. Before opening a writer, the file will be check if it exists (unless forceOverwrite is true) and create intermediate directories. Note: the defaults in SAMFileWriterFactory will be applied, except the useAsyncIo and createMd5.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReadWriterFactory()
      Creates a default factory.
